about_the_game:
The orcs look upon you and see victory. But, they will know only defeat.
The intense action of the reverse bullet hell genre meets first person shooter style combat. Choose your weapons and your arena wisely as you will have to battle hordes of relentless orcs. Unlock new weapons and upgrades to become a legendary warrior.
Surrounded, outnumbered, yet, you do not yield. Slay your foes, upgrade your arsenal and show no mercy.

Decide Your Combat Style

Master the art of destructive magic, become a melee master or a deadly combination of both.

Unleash Your Ultimate

Choose your ult wisely and wipe your enemy from the realm.

Auto or Manual Fire

Use precision timing or just take it easy and set it to auto fire. The choice is yours.

Plentiful Arenas

From large palace halls to meat grinder dungeons. You choose where the orcs meet their doom.

content_descriptors.notes: Features a lot of orc slayin'. Some blood shown. Some fire based weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 560X 4GB or Nvidia Equivalent
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Roguelite bullet hell meets FPS combat in Orc Survivors! Fend off waves of relentless orcs with a wide variety of abilities and weapons at your disposal.
